author: dreid
msg: Add the abort function into sms.  This is largely to keep compatability
with pools and at present we don't do anything more than get/set, but
Question is, do we still want this capability?

author: dreid
msg: Add a simple test that creates a number of sockets of different types
and carries out a very simple sendto/recvfrom test.
At some point we really should review all the network test apps we
have and try to reduce the number.  OTOH it's good that we can
test so many aspects of our networking support :)

msg: As far as Sander and I can tell the num_bytes functions are

should be hidden behind the pool debug checks.
